text: dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) atthmot choh pitabrakd nasa karosanyea robsa a l laoh kuchea karpit . haey tohbeicha yeung aoy anak( mou ham meat) meulkheunh tearounakamm khleah( now leu lokey) del yeung sanyea champoh puokke ryy yeung nung aoy anak slab( moun kheunh tearounakamm noh)kadaoy ka kanleng vilotralb robsa puokke chhpaoh mk kan yeung ddel
